body.name: KDG 2 Pack Cordless Table Lamp,Portable LED Desk Lamp, 5000mAh Battery Operated, 3 Color Stepless Dimming Up, for Restaurant/Bedroom/Bars/Outdoor Party/Camping/Coffee Shop Night Light(Black)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 14 mins
features: 【Cordless Portable Design】 Built-in 5000mAh rechargeable battery, you can use the light while charging. Can be used as an emergency light in case of power outage. Has passed the safety certification. Cordless design, moderate size, you can place the light anywhere without taking up visual space, simple and fashionable design makes your home more tasteful.

【Battery Powered Desk Lamp】 Charging time is 4-5 hours using USB Type-C, with a range of 8-40 hours depending on the brightness selected. When not in use for a long time, the battery will go into a dormant state and requires several charging cycles to stimulate battery activity. It should be used at room temperature, low temperature will affect the performance of the battery and reduce the capacity and service life.

【3 Color Stepless Dimmable】 Color temperature: 3000K-6000K, white light, warm white light and warm light. Stepless dimming (5%-100%); Touch switch control, light touch to switch the light mode, long press to control the light brightness. Lightweight and portable, suitable for outdoor camping/family gatherings/dinner party lighting and other places to create a romantic atmosphere for you.

【Metal Table Lamp】Made of metal lamp body, after matte coating treatment, anti-scratch and anti-corrosion; of which the gold color using electroplating treatment, smooth and texture. Acrylic lampshade, good light transmission and not blinding. The base contains non-slip pads to prevent accidental tipping.

【After-sale Service】We provide 180 days free replacement service, we hope you can get the best shopping experience. If your table lamp has any defects or stops working during this period, we will help you troubleshoot or send you a new product.
body.description: KDG Portable Cordless Table Lamp This LED cordless table lamp is battery-powered The LED table lamp is equipped with a rechargeable battery. You can connect the light all the way to the wall outlet to use it as a bedside light. It can also be a portable light at night, such as dating, outdoor parties or camping. The LED table lamp is equipped with a rechargeable battery. You can connect the light all the way to the wall outlet to use it as a bedside and reading light. It can also be a portable light at night, such as bars, dinners for couples, outdoor parties or camping. 360° surround lighting Move it anywhere LED energy-saving lamp beads Great gift for friends and family

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Note: When not used for a long time, the battery will enter into a sleep state, and needs to be recharged several times to stimulate the battery activity. It should be placed in a place with normal temperature, low temperature will affect the performance of the battery and reduce the capacity and service life.

KDG is a brand that focuses on customer experience. Our products are sold all over the world and are loved by consumers in all regions.We are very good at using simple methods to design products that are not simple. Such products are easy to match and not easy to be outdated. KDG Portable Cordless Table Lamp This LED cordless table lamp is battery-powered The LED table lamp is equipped with a rechargeable battery. You can connect the light all the way to the wall outlet to use it as a bedside light. It can also be a portable light at night, such as dating, outdoor parties or camping. The LED table lamp is equipped with a rechargeable battery. You can connect the light all the way to the wall outlet to use it as a bedside and reading light. It can also be a portable light at night, such as bars, dinners for couples, outdoor parties or camping. 360° surround lighting Move it anywhere LED energy-saving lamp beads Great gift for friends and family

More attention to product experience and details Our table lamps are made of metal with delicate spray paint for more texture. Market ordinary models usually use plastic material, the overall thin and no texture. Gold color model we use electroplating brushed process, more fashionable and beautiful.

Why choose KDG Table Lamp? The raw materials used in each table lamp are durable. Control the Switch by Easy Touch. The table lamp switch can be adjusted easily with the touch of a button on the top of the lampshade. Keep your Table clean Rechargeable table lamp can be placed everywhere without binding of wires. Product includes Type C charging cable. Power adapter is not included. Parameter Color: Black or White Material: Metal + Acrylic Light Source: Built-in LED Power: 5W Input Voltage: DC5V-2A Battery Capacity: 5000mAh Color Temperature: 3000K-6500K Stepless Dimming Switch: Touch Button

Unique Cordless Table Lamp for Indoor or Outdoor Use This table lamp has a sophisticated and modern appearance and can be used as a decoration on the dining table. The portable design does not take up the space of the dining table. This lamp illuminates a dark corner of your bedroom or living room, adding a cozy and relaxing vibe, and is also great as a night light. Designed with a soft, stable and non-flicker led light source. The beside lamp won't take up too much space. It is suitable for studying or working.

The cordless portable design is also very suitable for use in commercial environments, such as bars, restaurants, etc., and can also add atmosphere when camping. Minimalist design, can match perfectly with the environment, it is also a good decoration, a great gift for friends and family. 360-degree up and down surround light, higher brightness, adding a parent-child atmosphere and better eye protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Completely portable and provides excellenet dimmable light
reviews.reviewText: We received two similar items as a gift and wanted to add more because they are so useful and flexible. These are slightly shorter than the original ones, but are good looking and dimmable light quite bright at high setting.Perfect for outdoor table lights, mood lights, night lights in hallways or elsewhere. Easily recharge via a USB A plug. LIghts last multiple hourse -- at least 5 (which is the longest we have kept on. I am sure lenght varies by brightness but clearly these last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Table Addition
reviews.reviewText: During our Christmas & New Year Euro-vacation, we discovered these classy lamps used in numerous restaurants (one, centered on a smaller table, or two, on a longer, rectangular tables). With a small but solid, weighted base, they are attractive, optionally bright enough to read a menu or easily dimmed or switched between warm, white or off. They are available in several popular color options, (ours are waterproof for outside use) & rechargeable! What a great find & addition to our table!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I first bought a pair of the lights in white and we absolutely loved them. They stay charged for a long time and are very handy for outdoor dining or extra lighting anywhere. They have 3 settings, warm light, LED and more of a white light. They also have a dimmer function to set the mood. So we ordered a pair in black as well. However, one of the lights in that pair had a mind of it's own. It randomly turned on by itself and changed settings as it saw fit. 😆. This company was amazing to deal with. They sent out a replacement set the very next day and of course the return policy at Whole foods was extremely easy. Next, I'll pick up a pair on gold. I love these lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Unexpected Advantage!
reviews.reviewText: We don’t have a light above our dining table (deliberately, in case a future owner would want to reconfigure the open-concept space), so we purchased these to use at dinner time in the winter when it gets dark early. They provide beautiful (and quite romantic!) light. We didn’t realize how truly wonderful they were, however, until our power failed during a blizzard. We put one on each bedside table and were able to use them to navigate the house until sunrise. They take a long time to charge, and they’re worth every single minute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice BUT not a widely lit area
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is really great in several ways- looks very good from all angles , solidly made, heavy base for stability, 3 nice soft and bright light choices, seems to hold a charge for a long time! My problem is that I got this specifically to sit next to a reading chair in the middle of my living room where I don’t want to run a cord, BUT, I had to take one star off, because the shade is just not wide enough at the bottom to fully illuminate a book I’m holding on my lap. I intentionally chose this one because I like the shorter height, so this problem might be eliminated if it were taller. On the other hand, I moved it over to one of the coffee tables where we do jigsaw puzzles, and it’s perfect to sit right in the middle of the table or be able to be moved around to any part of the puzzle, so that is how I use it now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very well constructed
reviews.reviewText: Only had for a month or so, but very well pleased to this point. No cheap plastic model here, using them indoors, but heavy enough to withstand some wind. Three light settings,and each one is also dimmable. Simple one finger touch to operate and must use usb to charge battery. In my opinion,well worth the cost. an excellent choice for a comfortable easy to use low light situation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Lounge table lights
reviews.reviewText: Love the heavy base so the wind should not blow it over and the amount of light! Great accent pieces!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great. Bright. A little too complicated.
reviews.reviewText: Nice look. Bright. Three color temperatures. But, I have two dislikes. First, each color temperature saves its own brightness level. So, if you switch from a dim warm white to a daylight color, the daylight setting has its own brightness setting. So you could go from dim to bright just by changing the color temperature. Seems like an unnecessary feature. You must cycle through all three colors and three brightness levels to get to OFF. The second concern is the battery life. These come in a package of two, so when I use them as a pair, it is clear that one unit's battery life is quite shorter than the other's. One unit runs out at about 2 hours, but the other unit will run about twice as long. Suggests QA/QC issues.
La calidad no es muy buena
